author: Bloomberg News
title: Nearly 1 million Canadians applied for jobless claims last week as economy rapidly deteriorates
description: The new figure of 929,000 — 5% of the labour force — includes claims made over the weekend, source says
content:
Nearly one million Canadians applied for jobless claims last week, representing almost 5 per cent of the labour force, according to a senior government official with knowledge of the data.
The new figure of 929,000 includes the half-million unemployment appl… [+1196 chars]
